result.eng: We were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ga: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.orig: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.html: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maitheWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí frustraċas orainn mar ġeall ar an easpa foclóirí maiṫeWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.

result.eng: Because of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ga: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.orig: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.html: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ponchtml: Mar ġeall ar an droċaimsir cuireaḋ an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ga: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.orig: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.html: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ponchtml: Ġeall sí dó é – ní ḟéadfaḋ sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
